name: TOG Forum Width [Supporter]
description:
Increases the width of the forums by 250px each side - only use this version if you're currently a TOG supporter.
Does not increase the width of the main page (had to be this way to prevent issues)
additional_info:
There's a slight issue with the "my tog" menu button up the top right - I haven't been able to figure out how to fix is, but it's still all functional; so if you can cope with that, this should work well for you :)

I had to custom make images to adjust certain parts to the width. They're hosted on tinypic, so if parts of the theme start disappearing you should chuck me a message so I can reupload them (it shouldn't happen for a very very long time)
